comment: I took this class last summer and it was a mess, she never replied to my emails, wouldn't give us our grades until we begged for them and acted like she didnt want to explain anything, which is her JOB. Not the best foundation for the rest of the math courses.

We had 2 tests, one of which was an individual presentation of a math lesson, and a final. In class pop quizzes. Writing assignments that were useless for class. TERRIBLE about getting our grades to us, NEVER replied to e-mails despite multiple attempts. Didn't know what she was talking about half the time. Most stuff you have to teach yourself.

5 writing assignments,8 pop-quizzes,2 Exam's & 1 Final. We never received any of the grades for any assignments until more than half way through the semester, when we had to demand our grades because we had no idea where we stood. She doesn't know how to teach this subject at all.  ZERO feedback, never replied to emails.Math dept needs to know
